mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.category_id, p.quantity_sold, p.show_price, p.introduction, p.show_pic, p.page_title, pd.page_introduction, p.is_show, p.created_time, p.remarks FROM os_product p, os_product_detail pd WHERE p.id = #{id} AND pd.product_id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.category_id, p.show_price, p.introduction, p.show_pic, p.page_title, pd.page_introduction, p.is_show, p.created_time, p.remarks FROM os_product p, os_product_detail pd WHERE p.page_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND pd.product_id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.category_id, p.show_price, p.introduction, p.show_pic, p.page_title, pd.page_introduction, p.is_show, p.created_time, p.remarks FROM os_product p, os_product_detail pd WHERE pd.product_id = p.id
AND p.category_id = #{categoryId}
ORDER BY p.created_time DESC
ORDER BY p.quantity_sold DESC
ORDER BY p.show_price
ORDER BY p.show_price DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{quantity}
SELECT count(p.id) FROM os_product p WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT id, product_id as productId, name, value, sort FROM os_product_parameter WHERE product_id = #{id}
SELECT name FROM os_product_label WHERE product_id = #{id}
SELECT path FROM os_product_image WHERE product_id = #{id}
SELECT id, product_id as productId, name, quantity_sold as quantitySold, stock, price FROM os_product_specification WHERE product_id = #{id}
SELECT id, name FROM os_category WHERE id = #{category_id} LIMIT 1
